name: He or She? Animals
description:
-  What a cool cat)

 - This is she!

Everything is quite simple: you have two photos of animals, all you have to do is guess where is he and where it she.

A rather original idea wrapped in a nice interface:
  - 10 levels with unique content on each of them;
  - Achievement system;
  - English localization.

So where is he and where is she?)
